title: Barcelona star Neymar joins Lewis Hamilton in London | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share And he bumped into the three-time F1 world champion on Tuesday evening, with the pair posing for a picture together, which he then posted to Instagram, captioning it 'Bro'. Neymar also uploaded a video in which he dressed as a 'ninja' as he looked to enjoy his time away from Barcelona. The Brazilian forward also posted a picture of himself dressed as a ninja on Instagram stories Barca's stars have been given some time off following the 4-0 thrashing at the hands of PSG last Tuesday, which was followed up with a tepid performance against Leganes on Sunday. They face Atletico Madrid away from home this weekend, a game that could have a huge impact on their title chances. And it appears that Luis Enrique is keen to have his best players relaxed before the big game, with Lionel Messi jetting off to Egypt and Neymar also abroad. Neymar has had a difficult week off the field as well, after losing an appeal over tax charges in Spain. He, Barcelona and Santos will stand trial on fraud and corruption charges over his transfer after their appeals were turned down by Spain's High Court on Monday. The case stems from a complaint by Brazilian investment group DIS, which owned part of Neymar's transfer rights and alleges that it received less money than it was entitled to when Neymar joined Barcelona from Santos in 2013. Investigations were carried out in Spain and Brazil into whether any part of Neymar's transfer fee had been concealed when he moved to Barcelona from Santos.
